description: Implement stage transition endpoints to pass RED tests. Support advance to next stage, move to specific stage, transfer between jobs, convert prospects to active candidates.

description: Refactor application implementation to extract reusable patterns: state machine for stage transitions, rejection workflow, hire workflow into shared services.

description: Implement GET offers endpoints to pass RED tests. Return offers with all fields: id, application_id, version, created_at, updated_at, sent_at, resolved_at, starts_at, status, custom_fields, keyed_custom_fields.

title: [RED] Test Custom fields CRUD
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/custom_fields/{field_type}, GET /v1/custom_field/{id}, POST /v1/custom_fields, PATCH /v1/custom_fields/{id}, DELETE /v1/custom_fields/{id}. Test field types: application, candidate, job, offer, opening.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract Offer service patterns
description: Refactor offer implementation to extract reusable patterns: offer versioning, status state machine, compensation calculations into shared services.

title: [GREEN] Implement Webhook signature verification
description: Implement webhook signature to pass RED tests. Generate HMAC-SHA256 with secret key, include Signature header, handle Unicode escaping in JSON payloads.

title: [RED] Test Candidate activity feed
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/candidates/{id}/activity_feed, POST /v1/candidates/{id}/activity_feed/notes, POST /v1/candidates/{id}/activity_feed/emails. Test activity types and visibility.

title: [GREEN] Implement Webhook retry policy
description: Implement webhook retry policy to pass RED tests. Use Durable Object alarms for retry scheduling, track delivery attempts, exponential backoff with configurable intervals.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract Job service patterns
description: Refactor job implementation to extract reusable patterns: hiring team management, stage progression, opening tracking, job post publishing into shared services.

title: [RED] Test Applications list endpoint
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/applications endpoint. Test pagination, filtering by job_id, status, created_after, last_activity_after. Verify response structure includes candidate, jobs, current_stage, source, rejection details.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract Interview service patterns
description: Refactor interview and scorecard implementation to extract reusable patterns: scheduling logic, scorecard aggregation, interviewer feedback collection into shared services.

title: [GREEN] Implement API rate limiting
description: Implement rate limiting middleware to pass RED tests. Track requests per API key, return rate limit headers, handle 429 responses.

title: [RED] Test Applications CRUD operations
description: Write failing tests for POST /v1/candidates/{id}/applications, PATCH /v1/applications/{id}, DELETE /v1/applications/{id}. Test creating applications for existing candidates, updating application fields.

title: [RED] Test API authentication
description: Write failing tests for Basic Authentication with API token. Test Base64-encoded token format, 401 on missing/invalid auth, header validation.

title: Greenhouse Harvest API Compatibility
description:
Implement comprehensive API compatibility with Greenhouse Harvest API for the greenhouse.do platform. This epic covers all major endpoint categories including Candidates, Applications, Jobs, Interviews, Scorecards, Offers, Job Board API, and Webhooks.

## Goal
Achieve API parity with Greenhouse Harvest API to enable:
- Drop-in replacement for existing Greenhouse integrations
- Migration path from Greenhouse to greenhouse.do
- Familiar API surface for developers

## Scope
- Candidates (CRUD, tags, attachments, activity feed)
- Applications (stages, advance/reject, transfer)
- Jobs (CRUD, hiring team, stages, openings)
- Interviews (scheduling, scorecards)
- Offers (create, update, status tracking)
- Job Board API (public job listings, applications)
- Webhooks (event notifications)
- Organization Structure (departments, offices, users)

## References
- Harvest API: https://developers.greenhouse.io/harvest.html
- Job Board API: https://developers.greenhouse.io/job-board.html
- Webhooks: https://developers.greenhouse.io/webhooks.html

title: [GREEN] Implement Custom field options
description: Implement custom field options CRUD to pass RED tests. Handle option ordering, external_id for integrations, option destruction cascading.

title: [RED] Test Webhook signature verification
description: Write failing tests for HMAC-SHA256 signature generation and verification. Test Signature header format (sha256 [hex-digest]), Unicode escaping handling, request body signing.

title: [RED] Test Sources and rejection reasons
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/sources, GET /v1/rejection_reasons, GET /v1/close_reasons. Test source types (referral, social, agency, etc.), rejection reason categories.

title: [GREEN] Implement Job Board jobs list
description: Implement GET boards/{board_token}/jobs to pass RED tests. Return public job listings with all visible fields, support content parameter for full descriptions.

title: [RED] Test Candidates CRUD operations
description: Write failing tests for candidate create/update/delete. POST /v1/candidates, PATCH /v1/candidates/{id}, DELETE /v1/candidates/{id}. Test required fields, optional fields, validation errors.

title: [RED] Test Job hiring team management
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/jobs/{id}/hiring_team, PUT /v1/jobs/{id}/hiring_team, POST /v1/jobs/{id}/hiring_team, DELETE /v1/jobs/{id}/hiring_team. Test hiring managers, recruiters, coordinators, sourcers.

title: [RED] Test API rate limiting
description: Write failing tests for rate limiting: per-10-second limits, X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining headers, HTTP 429 on exceed.

title: [RED] Test Jobs CRUD operations
description: Write failing tests for POST /v1/jobs, PATCH /v1/jobs/{id}. Test job creation with departments, offices, hiring team, interview plan. Test updating job fields, status transitions.

title: [GREEN] Implement Webhook job events
description: Implement job webhook events to pass RED tests. Fire webhooks on job create/update/approve, job post create/update. Include job details, departments, offices.

title: [RED] Test Scheduled interviews list
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/scheduled_interviews, GET /v1/applications/{id}/scheduled_interviews, GET /v1/scheduled_interviews/{id}. Test filtering by application, created_after, updated_after. Verify response includes interviewers, start/end time, location.

title: [RED] Test Job Board education endpoints
description: Write failing tests for GET /v1/boards/{board_token}/education/degrees, GET /v1/boards/{board_token}/education/disciplines, GET /v1/boards/{board_token}/education/schools. Test degree types, fields of study, school search.

title: [GREEN] Implement Job stages and openings
description: Implement job stages and openings to pass RED tests. Support opening count, target start dates, status tracking, custom opening fields.

title: [GREEN] Implement Job Board application submission
description: Implement POST boards/{board_token}/jobs/{job_id} to pass RED tests. Handle resume/cover_letter upload, demographic answers, GDPR consent, custom question responses. Create candidate and application records.

title: [GREEN] Implement Job Board organization structure

Return paginated list of candidates with all fields: id, first_name, last_name, company, title, created_at, updated_at, last_activity, addresses, email_addresses, phone_numbers, social_media_addresses, recruiter, coordinator, tags, applications, educations, employments.

description: Implement GET /v1/applications to pass RED tests. Return paginated applications with all fields: id, candidate_id, prospect, applied_at, rejected_at, current_stage, source, jobs, answers, custom_fields.
